item.description:
Dinner in Chinatown
Time: 6:30 PM - 8:30 PM
Contact Information: Tom
Email: t_litrenta@yahoo.com
Telephone: 781-665-5920

Join other Sitz members for this delicious and inexpensive meal on MLK day. Last year 12 members enjoyed the evening. The cost is the meal cost!! We will order many dishes and share the food. This restaurant is the best kept secret in Chinatown.

Space is limited so please call Tom to coordinate reservations.
item.how_to_find_us: up to our eyeballs in dumplings maybe?
item.name: It's MLK, not MSG silly wabbit...
